params._finalToken: The token that user wants to receive
params._initialToken: The token that user wants to swap
params._initialTokenAmount: The amount of initial token that user wants to swap

returns.fee: The amount of fee that will be deducted from the final token.
returns.finalTokenAmount: The amount of final token that user will receive after fee deduction.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._finalToken: The token that user wants to receive
params._initialToken: The token that user wants to swap
params._initialTokenAmount: The amount of initial token that user wants to swap

params._finalToken: The token that user wants to receive
params._initialToken: The token that user wants to swap
params._initialTokenAmount: The amount of initial token that user wants to swap

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

swap(address,address,uint256).notice: Function to swap beween RP tokens and GHO token.This function charges different fee on each swap depending upon the tokens.

swapRP(address,address,uint256).notice: Function to swap among RPs.This function charges nominal fee on each swap. The fee is charged in final token and remaining is sent to user.
